Maya Gans

Data Visualization Engineer

Biography

I am currently a Data Visualization Engineer at Atorus Research where I develop custom applications using R and JavaScript. As an RStudio intern I designed TidyBlocks, a visual block based programming language. I also co-wrote JavaScript for Data Science. I use ggplot2 and d3.js to create music related infographics for JamBase.com. When I’m not coding, I’m climbing tall mountains.

Interests
  • JavaScript
  • d3.js
  • Shiny
  • Playing bass
  • Rock climbing
